quest.name: Very Familiar Carrots
journal:
 Quest Sync
Rhodopis is harboring a great deal of worry for a colleague who has wandered off.
objectives: Find the long-haired observer and slay any creations attacking him.
Render aid to the rabbit familiar.
Deliver the dazzling carrot to the long-haired observer.

dialogue.name: RHODOPIS
dialogue.text: Oh dear, I'm starting to worry some. It's my colleague, you see. We heard this horrid screech from a melanion, and he went rushing off to check what all the fuss was about. I was thinking of following after him, but... Well, just look at me.

dialogue.name: RHODOPIS
dialogue.text: You, however, appear well versed in combat and all such sanguinary escapades. Perhaps you might see if aught is amiss and ensure my coworker hasn't come to any harm?

dialogue.name: RHODOPIS
dialogue.text: That's very kind of you to agree to such a request. The last I saw of him, he was racing for the southern end of Kallimelios Zephyros. Do promise to hurry. I'm half-afraid he has wound up on the wrong side of some nasty fiends' fangs.

dialogue.name: RHODOPIS
dialogue.text: I'm sure you've pressing matters to attend to, but if you could locate my missing colleague, I would be most grateful. I only pray that you find him in one piece!

dialogue.name: BUNNY04310
dialogue.text: <squeak> <squeak>

dialogue.name: LONGHAIROBSERVER04310
dialogue.text: <sigh> ...That was much too close for my liking. Your timing was truly immaculate. I was quite trapped and would have been gobbled up if not for your timely interference!

dialogue.name: LONGHAIROBSERVER04310
dialogue.text: It was the agitated cries of the melanion which brought me here. When I arrived to see what inspired such howling, I discovered this fellow being set upon by that raging creature. I didn't hesitate to insert myself into the fray, of course.

dialogue.name: LONGHAIROBSERVER04310
dialogue.text: I should be fine, but it's the familiar for whom I'm most concerned. Could you make sure it's unharmed?

dialogue.name: LONGHAIROBSERVER04310
dialogue.text: Your intervention was a most welcome one, I assure you. I would be halfway digested by now if not for your help! Though I hate to ask, perhaps you might examine that familiar? I worry it's injured.

dialogue.name: BUNNY04310
dialogue.text: <sniff> <squeak>♪

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The familiar appears free of any injuries, scrapes, or bruises, and has left behind a dazzling carrot, as if to say thank you. Deliver the carrot to the long-haired observer.

dialogue.name: LONGHAIROBSERVER04310
dialogue.text: How is the familiar? Are they unharmed?

dialogue.name: LONGHAIROBSERVER04310
dialogue.text: A relief to know they are not too severely injured. Oh my─ What is that?

dialogue.name: LONGHAIROBSERVER04310
dialogue.text: You say the creature left it behind?

dialogue.name: LONGHAIROBSERVER04310
dialogue.text: A striking color for a carrot, wouldn't you say? Perhaps this was its way of showing its gratitude. What a thoughtful creature...

dialogue.name: LONGHAIROBSERVER04310
dialogue.text: ...And one I've never seen before. Whose familiar could it be, I wonder? I will perform an investigation upon my return.

dialogue.name: LONGHAIROBSERVER04310
dialogue.text: Now then, shall we head back to Poieten Oikos? I'm in a rather sorry state and would like to get cleaned up as soon as possible.

dialogue.name: RHODOPIS
dialogue.text: How very good it is to see you again. My friend─the one whom you plucked from the jaws of death itself─is seeking treatment for his wounds as we speak.

dialogue.name: RHODOPIS
dialogue.text: I heard the entire tale─how a rabbit familiar was on the scene. Mistress Venat was said to be researching one such familiar, or that's the story, anyway. Perhaps the one you came across is related to that business?

dialogue.name: RHODOPIS
dialogue.text: Well, regardless of its origins, it sounded like a rather polite creature, as I was told it left behind a sort of gift.

dialogue.name: RHODOPIS
dialogue.text: Yet I shan't be outdone by a bunny, charming though it surely is. Here you are: a present. It's nothing special, but I hope it proves as scrumptious as the carrot our mysterious familiar bestowed upon you and my colleague.
